content: That's a great list! I've seen a few of those already, but there are some new ones I'd love to check out. I'm particularly intrigued by "Midsommar" and "Ready or Not". I've been on a roll with horror films lately, having just returned from FrightFest in London where I saw "The Cabin in the Woods". It was my second festival in a month, following the Asian American International Film Festival in New York City, where I participated in a film critique workshop. Do you have any recommendations for horror films with a similar atmosphere to "Midsommar"? I loved the folk horror elements and the sense of unease that permeated the film.
